resources.string: "This feature is useful if you say you want to take a photo of a skin sample that is suspected of having melanoma cancer using the camera directly. If the application detects less than 50% of melanoma cancer you can scan up to 3 times to be more certain, and that too for skin that is detected as normal below 50%."

This feature is useful for those of you who say you want to take a photo of a skin sample that is suspected of having melanoma cancer if you save it in your cellphone gallery. If the application detects less than 50% of melanoma cancer you can scan up to 3 times to be more certain, and that too for skin that is detected as normal below 50%.
A feature used for scanners directly using the camera. You only need to point the camera at a skin sample that is suspected of having melanoma cancer.
In the settings there are 2 features such as dark mode to change the application theme and language change to change to the language you want to use.
